properties.name: fee-daily
properties.value: Mon-Fri: $7 | Sat-Sun: $2 (Prices are valid for up to 14 hours of parking. After the first 14 hours, the daily rate is $15.)

properties.name: fee-monthly
properties.value: Monthly passes are not available at MBTA garages.

attributes.name: State Escalator 374 (Oak Grove platform to City Hall Plaza)
Government Center Escalator 444 (North Station & North platform to street)
Maverick Escalator 428 (Unpaid lobby to Lewis Mall)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If on the Blue Line, exit at Revere Beach and cross over the tracks to board a Government-Center-bound train to return to Beachmont. If boarding, take a Government Center-bound train to Suffolk Downs. At Suffolk Downs, cross over the tracks and board a Wonderland-bound train.

attributes.name: State Escalator 6 (Oak Grove platform to Old State House lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, please use Aquarium Elevator 923 at the opposite end of the platform. If boarding, cross the Rose Kennedy Greenway and use the station elevator at the main entrance near the New England Aquarium and Long Wharf Marriot.

attributes.name: Wonderland Elevator 709 (Bowdoin platform to pedestrian plaza)

attributes.name: Maverick customer service agent with blank CharlieCards

State Elevator 803 (Forest Hills platform to Washington Street, Milk Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: Please use State Street Elevator 975 at the Wonderland Blue Line lobby (53 State Street). Alternatively, if exiting, take the Orange Line to Downtown Crossing and exit to Washington Street via Downtown Crossing Elevator 892. Turn left on Washington Street and travel one-third of a mile to Washington, School, and Milk Streets.

attributes.name: State Escalator 502 (Wonderland platform to Old State House)
Wood Island Elevator 889 (Bowdoin platform to pedestrian bridge)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Blue Line at Orient Heights and see station personnel or use the call box to request assistance. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Wood Island to request assistance. Alternatively, use the Route 120 bus service to connect between Wood Island and Orient Heights.

properties.name: alternate-service-text

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: To go from the Wonderland platform to the mezzanine, use Airport Elevator 931 (Athletic Field to overpass) and take the ramp to Airport Elevator 932 (Bremen Street to overpass) to the Bowdoin platform.

attributes.name: Revere Beach Elevator 885 (Wonderland platform to lobby)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, exit the Blue Line at Wonderland and switch to a Government Center-bound train. Exit at Revere Beach using Revere Beach Elevator 884. If boarding, take Revere Beach Elevator 884 to Beachmont and switch to a Wonderland-bound train.

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If on the Blue Line, exit at Suffolk Downs and to board a Wonderland-bound train to return to Beachmont. If boarding, take a Wonderland-bound Blue Line train to Revere Beach and use the footbridge to cross over the tracks to board a Government Center-bound train.

attributes.name: Government Center Escalator 446 (Blue Line platform to Green Line platform)
State Elevator 974 (Bowdoin platform to Congress Street, State Street)

properties.name: alternate-service-text
properties.value: If exiting, go down the ramp to the Oak Grove platform. Turn left and take elevator 967 or 802 to the Wonderland platform. From the platform take elevator 975 to reach the street. \nIf boarding, cross State Street to use elevator 975 to the Wonderland platform. Take the ramp to the Bowdoin platform, the hallway to the Forest Hills platform, or elevators 967 or 802 to the Oak Grove platform.
